metadata.feature_description: Share posts on social media platforms and generate RSS feeds

steps.action: Navigate to post detail page (Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review)
steps.expected: Post detail page loads with social share buttons visible
steps.actual: Post detail page loaded with Share this post section showing Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest and RSS icons

steps.expected: New window/tab opens to Twitter with share functionality
steps.actual: New tab opened to X.com (formerly Twitter) with share URL parameters correctly passed

steps.action: Click on Facebook share button from post detail page
steps.expected: New window/tab opens to Facebook share dialog
steps.actual: New tab opened to facebook.com/share.php with correct URL parameter: http://localhost:8081/en-us/News/Test-Workflow-Post-Submit-for-Review

steps.action: Click on LinkedIn share button from post detail page
steps.expected: New window/tab opens to LinkedIn share dialog
steps.actual: New tab opened to linkedin.com/shareArticle with correct URL and title parameters. URL included mini=true, url=encoded-post-url, title=Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review

steps.action: Click on Pinterest share button from post detail page
steps.expected: New window/tab opens to Pinterest pin creation
steps.actual: New tab opened to pinterest.com/pin/create/button with correct URL and description parameters. Pin Builder page displayed with Sign in to save this Pin prompt

steps.action: Click on RSS feed icon from post detail page
steps.expected: RSS feed XML is generated and displayed
steps.actual: Valid RSS 2.0 XML feed generated at /en-us/News/view/rss containing channel info and 2 items with proper structure (link, author, title, description, pubDate)

steps.action: Navigate to News page and view Publisher post detail
steps.expected: All enabled share buttons should be visible
steps.actual: All 5 share buttons visible in UI: Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS feed. Share this post label displayed above buttons

steps.action: Examine share URLs generated when clicking share buttons
steps.expected: Share URLs should contain correct post URL, title, and description
steps.actual: All share buttons generated correctly formatted URLs: Facebook includes u=post_url, LinkedIn includes url and title parameters, Pinterest includes url and description. Post URL correctly encoded in all cases

observations: Code review shows ShareSettingsManager.cs manages enable/disable settings for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS (default: all social enabled, RSS disabled)
ShareController.cs implements gamification/mechanics integration - share completions are logged for user scoring when logged-in users share content
Copy post link to clipboard feature was in suggested scenarios but no UI element found to test this functionality - code does not include clipboard copy feature
Share count tracking is handled server-side via ShareController.ShareCompletion API endpoint and is not visible in UI
